sections.section-type: Either header, hero, about, footer, etc.
sections.background: It can be either color given in HEX format or just 'image'

section-content.background: It can be either color given in HEX format or just 'image'

columns.size: Number of columns, and the sum of their sizes cannot exceed 12

widgets.element-type: It can be one of the following options: heading1, heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, subheading, normal text, image, button, search-bar, login, cart, vertical-form, horizontal-form, blog-roll, social-links, navigation-menu
widgets.chars-count: Number of characters for text in heading 1, heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, subheading, and normal text elements and it is used for only listed elements here
items: For example, 'About Us', 'Projects', 'Contacts'. It is used for only navigation-menu type
widgets.element-color: This is an optional setting that can only be in HEX
widgets.color: It is an optional settings and it can be only in HEX
widgets.height: it can be from 20px to 300px and it can be applied only for image, button elements
widgets.fitType: It can be applied only for button elements and it can be either fit or fill
widgets.align: It can be applied only for button elements and it can be either left, right or center
widgets.type: It can be applied only for button elements and it can be either primary or secondary
widgets.width: It is used by fitType settings and it can be from 30% to 100%
widgets.links-count: The number of social network to display. This setting is only for social-links element
